document: TRANSITIVITY, IDENTITY CONSERVATION AND EQUIVALENCE CONSERVATION OF A SOLID CONTINUOUS QUANTITY by GARY KEITH HUMPHREY B.A. (Hons.) University of New Brunawick, 1972 A THESIS SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF MASTER OF ARTS in the Department of Psychology We accept this thesis as conforming to the required standard. THE UNIVERSITY OF BRITISH COLUMBIA December, 1975
